      RayHit Plane3D.rayIntersect(Ray3D r) 
      abstract RayHit Object3D.rayIntersect(Ray3D ray)
      rayIntersect(r) returns a RayHit object, h, for the intersection of r with the object where h.distance is the distance to the intersection and h.normal is the normal at the intersection point If the ray does not intersect, then h.distance = -1 and h.normal is null
      RayHit Group3D.rayIntersect(Ray3D ray)
